originalText.text: Ive been here a few times and its been a pleasant experience. Appointments were honored on time and wait times were minimal. However this place isn‚Äôt personable. I was seen, was given medication and encouraged to buy treatment from the front desk. Thats it. I didn‚Äôt feel thoroughly cared for and it felt very transactional. Also medicine is the only option so you can‚Äôt even really get to the bottom of things. I suggest coming here if you need a quick appointment. I wouldn‚Äôt rush back here at all.

originalText.text: I‚Äôve always loved coming to the 125th street location. The front desk staff are very friendly and helpful and the Dennis P.A. is truly the best! He listens to all your needs and then provides the best treatment plan to fits your wants!

originalText.text: I'm glad I choose to come here . The receptionist is super friendly remembers my name already after two visits . Doctor is quick easy and painless A+ 10/10 .
